title: Triangle Bar, plate 1 from, "Fun, Friends, and Relatives"
description: man (Ramon Muxter) with long hair and moustache wearing a dress with his arm around a smiling man with curly hair and glasses, behind a pool table in a bar; 4 other figs. at R; 2 seated men in background at L; same image as 82.63.2 and 89.100.26
creditline: Gift of Gus Foster in memory of Ted Hartwell
